subject: Question: Best Heat Settings for Colored Hair?
body:
Hello BreezeLite Support,

I recently purchased a BreezeLite BLD-150 Everyday hairdryer and I love it so far!

I have a quick question: I just got my hair colored (balayage highlights), and I want to protect the color while styling. What heat setting would you recommend for color-treated hair?

Does your dryer have a specific "color-safe" mode or setting, or should I just use the lowest heat setting?

Also, how often should I clean the air filter? I've noticed it collects dust after about 2 weeks of daily use.

Thank you for your help!

Best,
Maya Patel
maya.patel@email.com
